text: Well here I go, Blueshieldca is denying my increase of diazepam which is required for Stiff Person Syndrome. Every time my doctor requests at $2200 per month. He wants 80mg/day which helps. I just want ADL.
SAM My doctors have me on fentanyl and diazepam. I am floating.
Laura’s got the diazepam in, couple of them and a few beers and I’ll be sleeping like a log
